lu.uni.geko.resources
Class SimpleResourceLoaderWrapper

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.resources.SimpleResourceLoaderWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
RefinedResourceLoaderExt, ResourceLoader
public class SimpleResourceLoaderWrapper
extends Object
implements RefinedResourceLoaderExt

A default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.resources.refinedresourceloaderext that wraps a simple resource loader so that it can be used like a refined resource loader (object adapter pattern).

See Also:
SimpleResourceLoaderExt, RefinedResourceLoaderExt

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Description copied from interface: ResourceLoader
Initialises the resource loader. Can be used e.g. for registering extension factories.

Specified by:
initialize in interface ResourceLoader

supportedFileExtensions

public Collection<String> supportedFileExtensions()
Specified by:
supportedFileExtensions in interface ResourceLoader
Returns:
a collection that contains all the file extensions (excluding the period ("."))for which this resource loader is responsible for.

Attention: Make sure that no file extension is supported by more than one registered resource loader to ensure deterministic behaviour!

                                                                                        String modelName,
                                                                                        Class<T> rootElementClass)
Description copied from interface: RefinedResourceLoaderExt
Returns the root element of the content of the model at the given URI if it is unique (exactly one root element) and has the type of the given class.

Specified by:
getUniqueContentRootIfCorrectlyTyped in interface RefinedResourceLoaderExt
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the root element
Parameters:
uri - the URI of the model to be loaded
modelName - the name of the model (for logging and error output)
rootElementClass - the class of which the root element has to be an instance of
Returns:
the root element
